DOC.brief_summary: This phase IV study open , prospective , single-center , single-surgeon bilateral eye study investigate bilateral uncorrected intermediate visual acuity presbyopic hyperopic patient , treat Presbyopia Algorithm SUPRACOR .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Investigation SUPRACOR Visual Outcomes Presbyopic Hyperopic Patients With Without Astigmatism

The proper SUPRACOR treatment patient must target dominant eye distance 0.0/ 0.25 dpt follow eye near 0.5/0.75 . The delta target must remain 0.5 dpt 8 .
